column4: can anyone point me in the right direction? i installed ubuntu 5.10 x86 then i followed the instructions to install kde using apt-get install kubuntu-desktop, now i cant figure out how to make it my default window manager
When you select it from the Sessions menu and log into KDE, it will ask whether you want to make it default.
i picked kde, it started up with the kubuntu logo then all the sudden it went back to ubuntu with gnome
